commandDescription: create a scratch org from pooled devhub orgs
definitionFileFlagDescription: path to a scratch org definition file
durationDaysFlagDescription: duration of the scratch org (in days) (default:7, min:1, max:30)
noAncestorsFlagDescription: do not include second-generation package ancestors in the scratch org
noNamespaceFlagDescription: creates the scratch org with no namespace
setAliasFlagDescription: set an alias for for the created scratch org
setDefaultUsernameFlagDescription: set the created org as the default username
waitFlagDescription: the streaming client socket timeout (in minutes) (default:6, min:2)
devhubPoolUsernamesFlagDescription: username or alias list for the pooled dev hub orgs
